languages.text: {n}Друкари — длинные черные плети, кажущиеся чем-то инородным на фоне ущелья — напряженно следят за вами, сжимая в руках оружие. Воины кабала Опустошительной бури неотрывно отслеживают каждое ваше движение, явно готовые к чему угодно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Друкари — длинные черные плети, кажущиеся чем-то инородным на фоне ущелья — напряженно следят за вами, сжимая в руках оружие. Воины кабала Опустошительной юбури неотрывно отслеживают каждое ваше движение, явно готовые к чему угодно.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that watch you closely and grip their weapons. The warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest are tracking your every move, apparently ready for anything.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари — длинные черные плети, кажущиеся чем-то инородным на фоне ущелья — напряженно следят за вами, сжимая в руках оружие. Воины кабала Опустошительной бури неотрывно отслеживают каждое ваше движение, явно готовые к чему угодно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, the long black scourges that watch you closely and clutch their weapons. The warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest are tracking your every move, apparently ready for anything.{/n}

{n}Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, the long black scourges that watch you closely and clutch their weapons. The warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest are tracking your every move, apparently ready for anything.{/n}

{n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that watch you closely and grip their weapons. The warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest are tracking your every move, apparently ready for anything.{/n}

{n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that watch you closely and grip their weapons. The warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest are tracking your every move, apparently ready for anything.{/n}

{n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that watch you closely and grip their weapons. The warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest are tracking your every move, apparently ready for anything.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Drukhari wirken fremd vor dem Hintergrund der Klamm. Lange, schwarze Gestalten, die dich genau beobachten und ihre Waffen umklammern. Die Krieger der Kabale des plündernden Sturms beobachten jede deiner Bewegungen, offenbar auf alles vorbereitet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that watch you closely and grip their weapons. The warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest are tracking your every move, apparently ready for anything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Drukhari wirken fremd vor dem Hintergrund der Klamm. Lange, schwarze Gestalten, die dich genau beobachten und ihre Waffen umklammern. Die Krieger der Kabale des plündernden Sturms beobachten jede deiner Bewegungen, offenbar auf alles vorbereitet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在深渊的映衬之下，眼前的黑暗灵族看起来有些陌生。这些瘦长的黑色身影紧盯着你，手中握紧了武器。狂风阴谋团的战士们正在仔细观察着你的一举一动，显然做好了应对一切局面的准备。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that watch you closely and grip their weapons. The warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest are tracking your every move, apparently ready for anything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在深渊的映衬之下，眼前的黑暗灵族看起来有些陌生。这些瘦长的黑色身影紧盯着你，手中握紧了武器。狂风阴谋团的战士们正在仔细观察着你的一举一动，显然做好了应对一切局面的准备。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les Drukharis détonnent dans le paysage de la gorge, leurs longues silhouettes noires vous observant en serrant leurs armes. Les guerriers de la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse ne vous quittent pas du regard, apparemment prêts à tout.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that watch you closely and grip their weapons. The warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest are tracking your every move, apparently ready for anything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les Drukhari détonnent dans le paysage de la gorge, leurs longues silhouettes noires vous observant en serrant leurs armes. Les guerriers de la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse ne vous quittent pas du regard, apparemment prêts à tout.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los Drukhari desentonan contra el fondo de la garganta: figuras negras y larguiruchas que te observan atentamente y sujetan con fuerza sus armas. Los guerreros de la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora vigilan cada paso que das, listos para cualquier posibilidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that watch you closely and grip their weapons. The warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest are tracking your every move, apparently ready for anything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los Drukhari desentonan contra el fondo de la garganta: figuras negras y larguiruchas que te observan atentamente y sujetan con fuerza sus armas. Los guerreros de la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora vigilan cada paso que das, listos para cualquier posibilidad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}峡谷を背にするデュカーリは異質なものに見える。その長く黒い影はこちらを食い入るように見つめて武器に手をかけていた。陰謀団『略奪の嵐』の戦士たちはあなたの全ての動きに目を光らせており、何が起きてもすぐに対応する構えである。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that watch you closely and grip their weapons. The warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest are tracking your every move, apparently ready for anything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}峡谷を背にするデュカーリは異質なものに見える。その長く黒い影はこちらを食い入るように見つめて武器に手をかけていた。陰謀団『略奪の嵐』の戦士たちはあなたの全ての動きに目を光らせており、何が起きてもすぐに対応する構えである。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drukhariler, önünde durdukları manzarayla tezat bir görüntü sergiliyor. Seni yakından izleyen uzun, siyah suretler; silahlarını kavrıyor. Her şeye hazır hâlde bekleyen Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı savaşçıları, her hareketini izliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari look foreign against the background of the gorge, long black figures that watch you closely and grip their weapons. The warriors of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest are tracking your every move, apparently ready for anything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhariler, önünde durdukları manzarayla tezat bir görüntü sergiliyorlar. Uzun, siyah suretler seni yakından izliyor ve silahlarını kavrıyor. Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı'nın savaşçıları her şeye hazır görünüyor ve her hareketini izliyor.{/n}
